pageTitle: granfondo GF02 Disc 105 – road – BMC Switzerland

textAfterTable: Versatility At home on fireroads, gravel, trail, cobbles, or smooth tarmac, in winter or summer, the granfondo GF02 disc is quite possibly the most versatile bike in the BMC road series. We’ve also put eyelets at the fork tips and dropouts, so you can easily mount panniers, enabling you to chase the sunset on a multiday adventure tour, or turn your GF02 into the ultimate trainer or commuter in the most adverse conditions. Confidence inspiring Disc brakes give you better brake modulation. This means confident brake feel no matter the conditions the weather throws at you. It also gives your fingers a break on strenuous mountain descents, while reducing the risk of overheating the rims. Thanks to the oversized down tube, and massive chain stays, the bike is renowned for its stability on descents. Designed to take up to massive 35 mm tires, the granfondo lets you tackle the roughest, bumpiest roads with ease. Race-ready This bike is fully UCI compliant for cyclo-cross races. The endurance-fit geometry has been subtly adapted for a more race-oriented fit. Frameset TCC and angle compliance, triple-butted aluminum Frame weight: 1260 g, including all hardware, size 54 cm Disc brakes only, postmount, 160 mm rotor diameter Removable fender/rack eyelets Tire clearance for 35c tires  Bottom bracket BSA 68 mm  Fork Compliance fork, TCC and angle
